mapper.insert: insert into T_CLOCK (CLOCK_ID, CLOCK_INDATE, CLOCK_STATE, EMPLOYEE_ID) VALUES (CLOCK_SEQUENCE.nextval,#{clock_inDate},#{clock_state},#{employee.employee_id})
INSERT into T_CLOCK (CLOCK_ID, CLOCK_OFFDATE, CLOCK_STATE, EMPLOYEE_ID) VALUES (CLOCK_SEQUENCE.nextval,#{clock_offDate},#{clock_state},#{employee.employee_id})
mapper.update: update T_CLOCK set CLOCK_OFFDATE = sysdate ,CLOCK_STATE =#{clock_state} where CLOCK_ID = #{clock_id}
mapper.select: SELECT * from T_CLOCK WHERE EMPLOYEE_ID = #{employee_id} and trunc(clock_indate) = trunc(sysdate)
SELECT * from T_CLOCK WHERE EMPLOYEE_ID = #{employee_id} and to_char(clock_offdate,'yyyyMM') = to_char(LAST_DAY(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -1)), 'yyyyMM') and Clock_state in {3,4,8,12}
